title: Produced beans don't generate metrics on methods @Timed

labels.name: triage/wontfix
labels.description: This will not be worked on

body:
### Describe the bug

When a produced bean has a public method annotated with `@Timed`, no metrics will be generated. `@ApplicationScoped` beans work as expected

### Expected behavior

Metrics are generated for produced beans

### Actual behavior

no metrics generated

### How to Reproduce?

[quarkus-timed-producers.tar.gz](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/9939109/quarkus-timed-producers.tar.gz)

execute tests in the attached project
